parameters.description: Array of field and meta keys, like [ 'id', 'date_updated', '1.2' ]

parameters.name: form
parameters.description: The form connected to the entry/revision diff being displayed

hooks.name: gravityview/entry-revisions/restore/add-new

parameters.name: add_new
parameters.description: Should a new revision be created based on the entry before the restoration? [Default: True]

parameters.name: prior_entry

parameters.name: new_entry
parameters.description: Current entry, after restoring values

parameters.name: remove_after_restore
parameters.description: [Default: false]

parameters.name: revision_id
parameters.description: ID of revision being restored

parameters.name: entry_id
parameters.description: ID of connected entry

hooks.description: Remove all Gravity Forms hooks when restoring a revision

parameters.name: remove_hooks
parameters.description: [Default: true]

parameters.name: entry_id
parameters.description: ID of entry being restored to

hooks.description: Filters the revision title, used in rendering the revision list as well as

parameters.name: revision_title
parameters.description: Existing revision title

parameters.name: revision_details
parameters.description: Additional information used in the title

hooks.name: gravityview/entry-revisions/send-notifications

parameters.description: Send or not. Default: true (send notifications)

parameters.name: revision_to_add
parameters.description: The new revision added.

parameters.name: current_entry
parameters.description: The replaced entry.

parameters.name: changed_fields
parameters.description: The new entry, with only the changed fields

hooks.name: gravityview/entry-revisions/show-filter-links
hooks.description: Filters the show filter links value.

parameters.name: show_filter_links
parameters.description: True: show the "approved"/"disapproved" filter links. False: hide them.
